-#include "caffe2/core/hip/context_hip.h"
-#include "caffe2/operators/cosine_embedding_criterion_op.h"
-#include "hip/hip_runtime.h"
-
-namespace caffe2 {
-namespace {
-
-__global__ void
-CECKernel(const int N, const float* S, const int* Y, const float margin, float* output)
-{
-    HIP_1D_KERNEL_LOOP(i, N) { output[i] = Y[i] == 1 ? (1. - S[i]) : fmaxf(0.f, S[i] - margin); }
body: cuda uses max() function here, which will not work for hip. hip uses fmaxf() for float arguments, whereas max() is for integers.
body_html: cuda uses max() function here, which will not work for hip. hip uses fmaxf() for float arguments, whereas max() is for integers.
body_text: cuda uses max() function here, which will not work for hip. hip uses fmaxf() for float arguments, whereas max() is for integers.
